name: mpl-koha-patch
title: MPL Koha Patch
description: LibLime Koha ILS modifications targeted to the staff of Madison Public Library
author: Lucas Schneider

preferences.name: skin
preferences.title: Select a display:
preferences.description: Determines the appearance of the extension

preferences.name: patronMsg
preferences.title: Pre-defined Patron Messages
preferences.description: Replace several of LibLime's pre-defined patron messages with messages more often used by MPL circ

preferences.name: validAddr
preferences.title: Validate Madison Addresses
preferences.description: Alerts library staff when an unacceptable or restricted Madison address has been entered and sets the proper 5/15 expiration date for dorm addresses

preferences.name: collegeExp
preferences.title: Autofill Patron Expiration for Students
preferences.description: Automatically filles in the correct 5/15 expiration dates for patrons whose address matches one of the 19 UW-Madison dorms

preferences.name: autoUserId
preferences.title: Autofill OPAC Login Number
preferences.description: Autofill a patron's OPAC username to the value of their library card

preferences.name: preselectPstat
preferences.title: Pre-select Madison P-STATs
preferences.description: Pre-selects the MADISON UNDETERMINED PSTAT for new patrons to make it quicker to lookup the correct value
